overview: From the sense of longing behind Hank Locklin’s Send Me the Pillow You Dream Onto the devotion expressed by the Statler Brothers in I’ll Go to My Grave Loving You, Love Songs 2 collects some of the most heartfelt country performances ever recorded. Conway Twitty makes you feel the hurt in (Lost Her Love) On Our Last Date, while Ronnie Milsap’s Pure Love is 100% joy. Good or bad, happy or sad, That’s the Way Love Goes.
title: Opry Video Classics: Love Songs 2
